【 UNIVERSAL SOCKET 】Unique design of this universal socket can automatically adjust to any size or shape, suitable for standard 1/4 to 3/4 inches and metric 7mm to 19mm screws, nuts, and blots, meeting all your needs. Compact and portable to anywhere you want.

【 STRONG MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVER】 Strong magnetic can keep the screws from dropping, and fixed the position of screw, in case of over drilling.
【 BENDABLE EXTENSION CABLE】 This cable can be bent, twisted and rotated at many different angles. It can be drilled into a small space, in a variety of gaps, rather than your hand, flexible installation work. Let this flexible drill bit extension tool help you solve more problems quickly.

Dimmable and energy saving: G40 outside porch string light come with 25*2 clear edison g40 bulbs and 2 spare replacement bulb. 1.56 inch light bulbs have e12 or c7 candelabra socket base, 5W per bulb, help you to save more electricity bill. Cute bulbs are dimmer compatible, creating a warm and romantic atmosphere that will make you feel relaxed and happy
Connectable and portable outdoor lights: 25*2 hanging sockets, 6 inch lead with male plug, 12 inch spacing between bulbs, 6 inch tail with female connector, total length 25 feet. End to end connect up to 3 strands. Portable size for easy carrying and storage
Safety and durable: UL certified deck lights is built with weatherproof technology, which can withstand extreme temperatures, rain, wind, and damp climates. Safe and durable electric bistro lights either with a built-in spare fuse for easy replacement
Practical and easy to install: This outdoor decorative light string is very easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere as you need. flexible and practical, a light bulb that goes out does not affect other lighting bulbs, for its vintage style light string, please search B07W59GM6J
Widely used: Our commercial lights are the perfect decoration for balcony terrace, garden, Bistro, pergola, gazebo, tent, barbecue, city roof, market, cafe, umbrella, dinner, wedding, birthday, party etc. For Bulbs replacement, please search B00R25V92Y

☞USES: Attach these Versatile Extender Bars to any Powered/Cordless Drill Chuck or Impact Driver to turn it into a High-Speed Nut Driver – Useful for Automotive Mechanic Vehicle Repairs, Technicians, Handyman & Hobbyist Developments to use with sockets on Hardware/Tire Nuts, Lag Bolts, Hex Head Cap Screws at Home, Workshop Factory or Construction Site.

Great for the DIY, household maintenance, and most general repairs, not for industrial work. A great tool addition to any tool box set.
☞Durability: Quality is a guarantee with this 3 piece sturdy and durable solid steel set designed to withstand torque compression under most standard use situations. The exterior anti-weathering coating provides extra protection from damage against elements and substances such as oil and fluids that may come in contact with the extension bars during use with repairs such as in the automotive field.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

Light Bulbs

Outdoor LED Spotlight

Outdoor Lamp

EDISHINE has been focusing on the unity of practicality and decorativeness. Dedicated to banish the darkness and bring light to millions of families, while making your living space more beautiful and cozy. Specializing in indoor and outdoor lighting fixtures such as floor lamps, pendant lamps, table lamps, ceiling lamps, wall lamps, floodlights and more, meeting all your lighting needs from spacious front door to narrow bedside table.

【Flexible & Stable】Equipped with 6ft SJTW 18/3C extension cord, this outdoor plug in flood light is flexible enough to offer greater installation range without extra extension cord, easy for you to plug it into any polarized outlet; the included ground stake helps to keep fixture more stable
【Easy to Install & Adjustable Head】Just use the screw and nut cap to connect the ground stake, then put your bulb (not included) into the socket; you can adjust the direction of the flood light head by adjusting the screw to change the direction of the light, meet your different illumination needs
【E26 Socket】 E26 base only supports maximum of 150W PAR38 bulbs (bulbs not included); with high quality ceramic lamp base, our outdoor flood light fixture is high temperature resistance and durable, eliminating the hassle of frequent bulb replacement and saving your money
【Wide Application & Warranty】The outdoor flood light holders have passed the wet location test, can be used in humid environments and weather, ideal for yard, patio, flag, holiday decor; UL listed and 1-Year Warranty provided, our service team is always glad to help you within 24 hours





EDISHINE is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement and Indoor & Outdoor Lightings. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products, A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

Outdoor Light Socket

Decorate Your Yard

Heavily weatherproof and waterproof performance floodlights made of sturdy material with shock-resistant closed lens housing that can withstand rain, snow, sleet, dirt, and dust in the outdoors.

120° Adjustable neck allows for the proper angle without the hassle repositioning.

Warm Tips:

This outdoor light does not contain bulbs, only par38 bulbs are used to ensure the waterproofness of the light.

  • Specification:
  • Input Voltage:120Vac, 60Hz
  • Waterproof:IP65
  • Meterial:Die-cast Aluminum
  • Recommended bulb type: par38 bulb (max 150W)

Read more




Flexible Angle

The Head of outdoor flood spotlight could be adjusted up to 120°，while if you want to adjust its angle, just loosen the nut, adjust the angle, and then tighten it.

Heavy Duty Cord

6 ft SJTW 18/3C heavy duty extension cord and the standard ground plug allow it to install directly instead of complex wiring, just plug it in in seconds and then enjoy your new yard after night falls.

Suitable for Any Weather

Only par38 bulbs with E26 base, maximum power 150W. The par38 bulb can be tightly fitted with the waterproof rubber ring to avoid the flooding of the outdoor light cocket.

Read more

Product Description

The Moongo Tool UNIVERSAL SOCKET is a must have tool for both the professional and the average person. It instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance. A great gift idea for dad, mom, father, mother, friends and family.

mens christmas gifts

You won’t know they needed a MoongoTool Universal Socket until they have one!

Built for Durability

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

One Size Fits Most

The MoongoTool Universal Socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

You Got The Power

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

Loosen and tighten fasteners in seconds and get the job done even faster!

christmas gifts for men

Save Time And Money

Our innovative tool allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

No more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

The Perfect Gift for any Occasion!

The must have gift for the Father, Husband, Handyman, Guys, Boyfriend, Him, Do-It-Yourselfer, Boyfriend, Man or Woman.

This makes the perfect gift for the not-so-handy.

Suitable for DIY

Professional self adjusting universal repair tools.Can be used in household maintenance, and construction

Trying to find a gift for someone that has every tool? Chances are they don’t have this!

UNIVERSAL SOCKET WRENCH can be adjusted to unscrew most metric, wing nuts, broken nuts, stripped nuts, eye bolts, square nuts, hexes, etc.unique design of the Hexagon and Spring Pins can be closely engaged with the parts, not easy to slip. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, automotive repair, and other household maintenance.
TOOS FOR MEN: Self-adjustable from standard 1/4in to 3/4in and metric 7mm to 19mm with over 130lbs of torque. Adapter turns your drill into a socket driver.
SPECIALLY MATERIAL: Durable chrome vanadium steel material, the hardness can reach 56HRC. We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly, Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!
GIFTS FOR MEN who have everything, a perfect gift for Father’s day/Mother’s day/Birthday/Valentines Day/Christmas/Anniversary /Halloween/Thanksgiving gifts etc. fathers day gifts for dad/grandpa/stepdad/hushand/brother from wife/daughter/son/girlfriend/kids. You won’t know you need universal socket until you have one! Make it yours now and make your life more easier.
UNCOMPROMISING CUSTOMER CARE: Any question, please feel free to contact us through Amazon,We will save your problem within 24 hours.We’d love to make you a perfect purchase experience!

Product Description

Material
Cr-V Cr-M Cr-M Cr-M Cr-V Cr-V

Drive Size
1/2″ , 1/4″, 3/8″ 1/2″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 1/2″

Style
/ 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 & 12 Point Shallow

Are you tired of the bolts, nuts, and screws are damaged even if stripped, rusted, or frozen? What will you do? Break it loose with a breaker bar and then fitting the new socket by a hammer or a mallet? But this will damage your socket. Thankfully, THINKWORK impact bolt extractor set is around you to help you to continue to work on your project with ease.

Includes 16 pieces of the most used SAE and metric sizes impact bolt extractors.

3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″.

Superior Gripping Power

The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes is designed to bite down to provide maximum gripping power. The more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.

Hex Adapter & Knockout Pin

1/4″ drive hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.

Standard 3/8 Inch Square Drive

All the extractors can be used by hand tools or any 3/8-inch air and power tools.

Organized Storage

All the extractors are well packed in a heavy-duty blow-molded case for secure storage and easy carry.

Each bolt extractor is made of high hardness chrome-molybdenum steel for superior durability and longer life. It will easily extract damaged bolts, nuts, and screws even if they are stripped, rusted, or frozen.
The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes design to bite down to provide maximum gripping power, the more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.
Standard 3/8-inch drive and hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.
18 pieces 3/8 inch drive bolt & nut remover comes with 3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″, hex adapter and knockout pin.
Heavy-duty blow-molded case lets all the extraction sockets stay organized and take your set on the go.

Are you tired of the bolts, nuts, and screws are damaged even if stripped, rusted, or frozen? What will you do? Break it loose with a breaker bar and then fitting the new socket by a hammer or a mallet? But this will damage your socket. Thankfully, THINKWORK impact bolt extractor set is around you to help you to continue to work on your project with ease.

Includes 16 pieces of the most used SAE and metric sizes impact bolt extractors.

3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″.

The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes is designed to bite down to provide maximum gripping power. The more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.

Hex Adapter & Knockout Pin

1/4″ drive hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.

Standard 3/8 Inch Square Drive

All the extractors can be used by hand tools or any 3/8-inch air and power tools.

Organized Storage

All the extractors are well packed in a heavy-duty blow-molded case for secure storage and easy carry.

Each bolt extractor is made of high hardness chrome-molybdenum steel for superior durability and longer life. It will easily extract damaged bolts, nuts, and screws even if they are stripped, rusted, or frozen.
The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes design to bite down to provide maximum gripping power, the more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.
Standard 3/8-inch drive and hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.

Heavy-duty blow-molded case lets all the extraction sockets stay organized and take your set on the go.

The 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket features three interchangeable sockets store on the driver shaft to avoid any loose pieces that can get lost. The tool is impact rated for use with any impact driver. A powerful Rare-Earth magnet allows the sockets to hold onto any fasteners. Sockets are color coded for easy identification. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn’t just the name of our company, it’s also our family name. And since we’re an American company that’s family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.
6 INTEGRATED HEX SIZES plus 1/4-Inch deep bit holding feature
IMPACT RATED SHAFT AND SOCKETS can also be used with an impact driver
HEX DRIVER SIZES include 1/4-Inch, 5/16-Inch, 11/32-Inch, 3/8-Inch, 7/16-Inch and 1/2-Inch
MULTI-FUNCTION 1/4-Inch SOCKET has both shallow (driver) and deep (bit holder) positions
FLIP SOCKETS store on shaft in any order or orientation
POWERFUL RARE-EARTH MAGNET securely holds bits and hex head fasteners
DETACHABLE SOCKETS allow for easy removal of metal shavings from magnet

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Impact Driver, 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket Set with Handle, 6 Hex Driver Sizes plus a 1/4-Inch Bit Holder

The 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket features six hex driver sizes plus a bit holding feature to easily switch between sizes. Three interchangeable sockets store on the driver shaft to avoid any loose pieces that can get lost. The tool is impact rated for use with any impact driver.

  • 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket Set includes six integrated hex sizes plus a 1/4-Inch bit holding feature
  • Quickly and easily change blade between a screwdriver handle and an impact driver
  • Includes 1/4-Inch, 5/16-Inch, 11/32-Inch, 3/8-Inch, 7/16-Inch and 1/2-Inch nut driver sizes
  • Multi-function 1/4-Inch socket has both shallow (driver) and deep (bit holder) configurations for added versatility
  • Powerful Rare-Earth Magnet securely holds bits and hex head fasteners
  • Features 1/4-Inch Quick-Connect adapter for easy use with an impact driver
  • Sockets are color coded for easy identification
  • Detachable sockets allow for easy removal of metal shavings from magnet

Read more

FEATURES

Includes 6 integrated hex sizes plus 1/4-Inch bit holder

Quickly change between a screwdriver handle and an impact driver

Store sockets on shaft in any orientation or order

Unique Stocking Stuffers For Men Universal Socket

We are a professional hardware manufacturer with over 30 years of experience who pursues to create a safe living space and bring safety and comfort for everyone in daily life.

The Universal Socket Set is suitable for everyone who needs it, whether you are a professional or an average person.

The Magical Grip Socket instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. This universal socket can be used in the automotive industry, home maintenance, manufacturing, construction and other industries.

One Size Fits Most Super Universal Socket

The universal socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp any shape nut,such as wing nut,hook nut,flange nut,hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

Upgraded Much Stronger Socket Tool

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

No need to hunt a socket. This covers most sizes and Works on stripped bolts and odd shapes ones too.

Satisfy Your Different Needs

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

This universal socket is perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance.

Read more

Great Time Saver Tool Gifts

The universal socket allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

This is perfect for auto repair and no more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

Easy to Carry Dad Gifts

HELEMAN socket set delivers accurate appliance and extended bolts compatibility suitable for any kind of repair work.

Keep it in your car, boat, bike, backpack, tackle box, or back pocket!

Perfect Gifts for DIYer

Professional self adjusting universal repair tools.Can be used in household maintenance, and construction

Offer this handy universal socket tool to any DIY enthusiast friend and they will definitely appreciate it.

outlet timer

CONTROL FROM ANYWHERE – Turn lights, fans, and appliances on or off automatically from anywhere in the world with your smartphone anytime via the HBN Smart app.
DUAL PLUG & INDEPENDENT CONTROL – HBN smart plugs with two grounded outlets (up to 15A, 1875w) feature space-saving for users, which can control all electrical appliances individually or together.
VOICE CONTROL – Simply voice command to control multiple home devices with our smart outlet via Alexa or Google Home. Enjoy the hands-free convenience of controlling any home electronic appliances. Made for everyone, Perfect for elderly, disabled or if the plug is hard-to-reach.
TIMER AND SCHEDULE SETTING- Use timer or countdown schedules to automatically turn on and off any home electronics and appliances such as lamps, fans, humidifier, Christmas lights etc. For example, setting lights to come on at dusk or turning off at sunrise to reduce energy consumption and save money.
EASY TO INSTALL & WARRANTY – Download the HBN Smart App and follow the instructions to connect the smart plugs. No Hub Required, works with 2.4GHz network. ETL certified for safety use. 15 months warranty.
